DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized controlled trial of CMV-Ig in lung transplant recipients at the Cleveland Clinic Foundation who are hypogammaglobulinemic.
DOC.brief_title: Cytomegalovirus Hyperimmune Globulin (CMV-Ig) Replacement in Hypogammaglobulinemic Lung Transplant Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: This is a randomized controlled trial of CMV-Ig in lung transplant recipients at the Cleveland Clinic Foundation who are hypogammaglobulinemic.
